info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 29 at 12:32PM CDT until June 30 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...
Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County.
For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the Happy Hollow Picnic Area floods.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 6.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this afternoon to 8.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening to 6.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 7.3 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 700 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING
